publications.title: Trading and Exchanges: Market Microstructure for Practitioners
publications.summary: Comprehensive treatment of market microstructure from a practitioner's perspective. Covers order types, market design, trading costs, liquidity, and market manipulation. Essential reference for understanding how markets actually work.

publications.title: Market Microstructure: A Survey of Microfoundations, Empirical Results, and Policy Implications
publications.summary: Authoritative academic survey covering theoretical models of market microstructure, empirical findings, and policy implications. Includes inventory models, asymmetric information models, and order flow analysis.

publications.title: Technical Analysis: The Complete Resource for Financial Market Technicians
publications.summary: Comprehensive encyclopedia of technical analysis methods. Covers chart patterns, indicators, oscillators, market sentiment, and intermarket analysis. CMT Association official reference.

publications.title: Evidence-Based Technical Analysis: Applying the Scientific Method and Statistical Inference to Trading Signals
publications.summary: Critical examination of technical analysis through the lens of statistical rigor and scientific method. Addresses data mining bias, overfitting, and proper hypothesis testing. Essential for avoiding false patterns.

publications.title: Market Liquidity: Theory, Evidence, and Policy
publications.summary: Rigorous treatment of liquidity in financial markets. Covers theoretical models, empirical measurement, market design impacts, and regulatory policy. Bridges academic research and practical applications.

publications.title: Algorithmic Trading and DMA: An Introduction to Direct Access Trading Strategies
publications.summary: Practitioner's guide to algorithmic execution strategies and direct market access. Covers VWAP, TWAP, implementation shortfall, and order routing. Industry standard reference for execution algorithms.

publications.title: Global Macro Trading: Profiting in a New World Economy
publications.summary: Framework for global macro trading covering economic indicators, central bank policy, currency markets, and commodity cycles. Practical approach to macro strategy development and risk management.

publications.title: Expected Returns: An Investor's Guide to Harvesting Market Rewards
publications.summary: Comprehensive analysis of risk premia across asset classes. Covers equity risk premium, value/momentum factors, carry strategies, and portfolio construction. Bridges academic research and institutional investing.

publications.title: The Handbook of News Analytics in Finance
publications.summary: Collection of research papers on quantitative news analysis, sentiment extraction, and event-driven trading. Covers NLP techniques, sentiment scoring, and news impact measurement.

publications.title: Trading on Sentiment: The Power of Minds Over Markets
publications.summary: Behavioral finance and sentiment analysis for traders. Covers psychological biases, social media sentiment, and contrarian indicators. Practical framework for sentiment-based trading.

publications.title: Options, Futures, and Other Derivatives
publications.summary: Industry-standard textbook on derivatives pricing and risk management. Covers Black-Scholes, binomial models, Greeks, hedging strategies, and exotic options. Essential reference for options trading.

publications.title: Option Volatility and Pricing: Advanced Trading Strategies and Techniques
publications.summary: Practitioner's bible for options trading. Covers implied volatility, volatility skew, options spreads, and risk management. Focus on practical application of options theory.

publications.title: Trading Risk: Enhanced Profitability through Risk Control
publications.summary: Comprehensive framework for trading risk management. Covers position limits, portfolio risk, drawdown control, and risk-adjusted performance. Institutional-grade risk systems design.

publications.title: Advances in Financial Machine Learning
publications.summary: Modern machine learning techniques for quantitative finance. Covers feature engineering, meta-labeling, backtesting, and portfolio construction. Addresses overfitting, data leakage, and statistical pitfalls.

publications.title: Inside the Black Box: A Simple Guide to Quantitative and High-Frequency Trading
publications.summary: Demystifies quantitative and HFT strategies. Covers alpha models, risk models, transaction cost models, and portfolio construction. Accessible overview of systematic trading.

publications.title: Algorithmic and High-Frequency Trading
publications.summary: Rigorous mathematical treatment of algorithmic trading and HFT. Covers optimal execution, market making, order book dynamics, and latency arbitrage. Bridges academic research and industry practice.
